experiment_name: Chemoselective Cyclopropanation over Carbene Y-H Insertion Catalyzed by an Engineered Carbene Transferase
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:7.2;    reaction_other_conditions:E. coli whole cells (OD600 = 40), 10 mM sodium dithionite (Na2S2O4), 12 hours, anaerobic conditions, 500 µL-scale reaction;    reaction_substrate_concentration:10 mM (3a or 4a), 10 mM (2)
